name: Credit-card-textbox-effect
tagline: When the user fill in the card number, every four digits will automatically fill in a blank space
body:
Credit-Card-textbox-Effect
==========================

When the user fill in the card number, every four digits will automatically fill in a blank space


Author from [Tsung-Shuan Liu](https://github.com/FireQQTW)

This credit card number effect is derived from [jessepollak](https://github.com/jessepollak/card.git)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
